channel.title: ESP32 on Fabian's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in ESP32 on Fabian's Portfolio

item.title: ESP32 Weather Station
item.author: fabianmolina@stanford.edu (Fabian Molina)
item.description: Project Description: I developed a weather station using an ESP32 microcontroller that fetches live weather data from the OpenWeather API and displays it on an OLED or LCD screen, with code options for both display types.
